detail.spring-ws:ValidationError: cvc-complex-type.2.4.a: Invalid content was found starting with element 'tns:firstName'. One of '{"http://www.capita-software.co.uk/schema/citizencommon":title, "http://www.capita-software.co.uk/schema/citizencommon":forename, "http://www.capita-software.co.uk/schema/citizencommon":middlename, "http://www.capita-software.co.uk/schema/citizencommon":surname}' is expected.
